meanings.definition: A plural noun meaning a keyboard instrument with strings.
meanings.sent1: The clavi in the music room produce beautiful sounds.
meanings.sent2: She played the clavi at the concert last night.
meanings.sent3: The clavi in the orchestra decided to start a band.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers danced on the clavi like a skilled artist.
meanings.sent5: The clavi echoed through the hall, enchanting everyone.

meanings.definition: A plural noun meaning a group of keys on a keyboard instrument.
meanings.sent1: The clavi on the piano are black and white.
meanings.sent2: He pressed the clavi gently to create a soft melody.
meanings.sent3: The clavi on the keyboard were tired of being pressed all day.
meanings.sent4: The clavi on the organ stood in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent5: Her fingers moved swiftly across the clavi, creating magic.

meanings.definition: A plural noun meaning a group of keys on a computer keyboard.
meanings.sent1: The clavi on the laptop are small and easy to type on.
meanings.sent2: She typed quickly on the clavi to finish her assignment.
meanings.sent3: The clavi on the computer were tired of being clicked all day.
meanings.sent4: His fingers flew over the clavi like a skilled typist.
meanings.sent5: The clavi on the keyboard glowed in the dimly lit room.
